title: Microsoft Announces Major Price Increases for Enterprise Cloud Services in 2024
content: Microsoft has revealed significant pricing adjustments for its enterprise cloud services, with increases ranging from 15% to 20% across various Azure and Microsoft 365 offerings. The changes, effective April 2024, impact enterprise agreement customers...

title: CrowdStrike vs. SentinelOne: 2024 Pricing Comparison for Enterprise Security
content: As cybersecurity budgets tighten, enterprises are scrutinizing endpoint protection costs. Our analysis of CrowdStrike and SentinelOne pricing reveals significant changes in 2024, with both vendors adjusting their models...

title: Supply Chain Crisis Drives 30% Increase in Dell Server Prices
content: Dell Technologies confirms substantial price increases for its PowerEdge server line, citing ongoing supply chain disruptions and component shortages. Enterprise customers face budget challenges as hardware costs soar...

title: Fortinet Shifts to Subscription-Only Model, Impacting Total Cost of Ownership
content: Fortinet's transition from perpetual licenses to a subscription-only model for FortiGate firewalls has enterprises recalculating their security budgets. Analysis shows potential 40% TCO increase over three years...

title: TD SYNNEX and CDW Compete with Aggressive Cisco Discounts
content: Major IT distributors TD SYNNEX and CDW are offering unprecedented discounts on Cisco networking equipment, with some products seeing 25% off list price. The competitive pricing reflects excess inventory...

title: Palo Alto Networks Restructures Prisma Cloud Pricing Model
content: Palo Alto Networks introduces credit-based pricing for Prisma Cloud, moving away from traditional per-workload licensing. Enterprise customers report mixed reactions to the 12-15% price adjustment...

title: Gartner Report: Enterprise Software Pricing Trends 2024
content: Gartner's latest analysis reveals enterprise software vendors are implementing average price increases of 10-20% in 2024, driven by inflation, R&D costs, and market consolidation. CIOs must adapt procurement strategies...
